column1: #Text=I 'm having fun for once , just being a normal kid .
#Text=You do n't know what it 's like , Sokka .
#Text=You get to be normal all the time .
#Text=" Aang says : " Listen guys , those kids at school are the future of the Fire Nation .
#Text=If we want to change this place for the better , we need to show them a little taste of freedom .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What could you possibly do for a country of depraved little fire monsters ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm gon na throw them , a secret dance party !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Go to your room !
